LearnerProgramRequirement.name: LearnerProgramRequirement
LearnerProgramRequirement.description: Represents details of the requirement that a learner is required to complete in their assigned Learning Program Plan.

Description.description: Description of a Learner Program Requirement.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearnerProgramId.description: Learning Program Plan assigned to a learner.

LearningProgramPlanRqmtId.description: The Learning Program Plan associated with the Learner Program Requirement.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Name of the Learning Program Requirement that’s assigned to an individual.

Status.description: Status of the learner’s progress towards meeting the requirement.
